amendatorysection.para: Funds received in repayment for energy efficiency loans from the School Weatherization Fund shall be credited to the General Fund. For each fiscal year in which there are any outstanding loans, the Legislature shall designate a portion of the funds received in repayment for energy efficiency loans for use by the State Energy Office to cover the actual cost of administering outstanding loans. Transfers may be made from the School Weatherization Fund to the General Fund at the direction of the Legislature.
